conbody.p: Select Configure student modules from the Tools menu to launch Nibelung Configurator.

ConfiguratorNibelung Configurator is a Dialog Nibelung application for remotely configuring student modules from the teacher workstation. It also allows you to change some additional settings of the teacher module.
Double click on the Seat ID or Server fields to edit parameters for the student workstation and press Apply button to send the new configuration.
Please refer to section of this manual for further details of the student module settings.
Please refer to the section of this manual for further details of the teacher module settings.
